doc.title: Faces of Horror
doc.plot: Although marketed as a "Faces of Death" type of documentary video, this is actually a compilation of scenes--in no particular order--from three different public-domain pictures that were originally released by American-International Pictures from the 1960s and 1970s: _Queen of Blood (1966)_ (qv), _Gezora, Ganime, Kameba: Kessen! Nankai no daikaij√ª (1970)_ (qv) and _Thing with Two Heads, The (1972)_ (qv).
